byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and JEREMY W. PETERS

lead_paragraph: Mr. Rubio’s time is quickly running out, according to even his own supporters, who are offering increasingly candid assessments of his chances.

headline.print_headline: Rubio Has Party Leaders, but Not Time, on His Side in a Bid to Stop Trump
headline.main: Marco Rubio Gets Party’s Blessing, but Not Voters’

snippet: Mr. Rubio’s time is quickly running out, according to even his own supporters, who are offering increasingly candid assessments of his chances.
abstract: Supporters of Sen Marco Rubio acknowledge that he is running out of time to score victories with voters, despite having drawn wealthy donors and Republican Party leaders to his candidacy; Rubio has failed to win single contest in four states, leaving his path to nomination very narrow and reliant on forces beyond his control.
